meanings.definition: Not timely; happening or done at a time that is not suitable or appropriate.
meanings.sent1: The untimeliest rain ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent2: Her untimeliest arrival disrupted the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The untimeliest alarm clock made me late for work.
meanings.sent4: His untimeliest joke during the serious presentation caused laughter.
meanings.sent5: The untimeliest snowstorm in May was truly unexpected.

meanings.definition: Inopportune; occurring at an inconvenient or inappropriate time.
meanings.sent1: It was the untimeliest moment for the power outage to occur.
meanings.sent2: The untimeliest phone call interrupted their conversation.
meanings.sent3: The untimeliest sneeze came during the quietest part of the movie.
meanings.sent4: Her untimeliest decision to wear flip-flops in the snow shocked everyone.
meanings.sent5: The untimeliest fire drill happened during the final exam.
